#dossier pour tuto dada2
```{bash}
wget https://mothur.s3.us-east-2.amazonaws.com/wiki/miseqsopdata.zip
```
#dézipper dossier pour tuto dada2
```{bash}
unzip miseqsopdata.zip
```

